original_title: The Roof on the Road: Dallas
overview: Popular prime-time TV show "The Roof" hits the road for the big city of Dallas, delivering a live concert with the best urban artists in Latin music -- all on one stage. Tracks include "Lero Lero" by K1; "Esa Loca" and "Semana Mambo" by El Boodah; "Sobre Aviso" and "Poko Hombre" by Ana Alicia; "Call Me" and "Freaks" by Play N' Skillz; "Son de la Loma" by Don Dinero; "On the Floor" and "Number 1 Fan" by Frankie J; and "Dile" by Ivy Queen.
title: The Roof on the Road: Dallas
